content: **this pattern will be released the 28th of march ** this mini shawl is a fun and fast project for every knitter and is beginner friendly this shawl is knitted from side to side in stockinette then crochet lines are added and a i-cord it uses 4 colors of merino sport mini 20g from la bien aimée **size** one size **materials** 65m of each color c1 c3 and c4 130m of c2 c1 1 mini 20g skein of merino sport in kokko for the corner c2 2 mini 20g skeins of merino sport in sansa for the main part c3 1 mini 20g skein of merino sport in peach sweater for the lines c4 1 mini 20g skein of merino sport in anemone for the i-cord **notions** 3 5mm knitting needles 3 5mm crochet hook darning needle **gauge** 24 stitches x 30 row = 10cm after blocking in stockinette
